data.title: Xerocraft
data.meta_description: Where people and ideas come together
data.text:
Become a member

By becoming a member and purchasing a membership package or a recurring membership, your contribution helps us pay our rent, cover our enormous electricity bill, cover the cost of maintenance, maintain or replace our tools as they age, and improve our space over time!

Learn about the benefits of membership

Join a Group

Xerocraft is home to a ton of groups. You can join one you like, or even start your own!

Learn about and explore Xerocraft's groups.

Volunteer

Volunteer with Xerocraft and be apart of a community striving to better our community, help and learn from one another, and improve ourselves.

Learn about what you can do to help.
